1.  Chatbot .ipynb: Creating a chatbot in python, using TensorFlow library.
    The bot is trained on comment data from Reddit, from the years 2005 to 2012.
    This project is an implementation of the following:
    https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dvOnYLDg8_Y&list=PLQVvvaa0QuDdc2k5dwtDTyT9aCja0on8j . 
    
    
2.  QuorInsincereQuestions: Classifying Quora questions into normal vs insincere classes. Kaggle Competition: 
    https://www.kaggle.com/c/quora-insincere-questions-classification . 
    
    
3.  kNN.ipynb : k-nearest neighbour classifier from scratch for Iris dataset.
